short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Shark.IO: A quirky puzzle game where you stretch and bounce. Try it now!

short.fr: SharkIO: Un jeu de puzzle original où vous pouvez étirer et rebondir. Essayez-le maintenant !

short.lt: SharkIO: Keista galvosūkio žaidimas, kuriame tiesiogini ir atsitiesk. Išbandykite jį dabar!

short.zh_CN: SharkIO: 一款古怪的益智游戏，您可以拉伸和弹跳。立即试玩！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shark.io continues the exciting tradition of .io games. Take on the role of a hungry shark, battling for supremacy in the vast ocean. 🐟🍖 Eat the food you find to grow bigger, but watch out for bigger sharks! It only takes a few seconds for the game to end!

How to Play:

Eat Fish and People: 🐠👫 Eating fish (and people) earns you points and helps you grow.
Watch Out for Bigger Sharks: 🦈 Be cautious of larger sharks; they're powerful but less nimble.
New Players Have an Advantage: 🌟 Smaller sharks are quicker and can outmaneuver larger ones.
Survive and Grow: 💪 By living to fight another day, you'll become the biggest fish in the ocean!
Controls:

Dash: Press the mouse button to dash.
Steer: Point the mouse to steer your shark.
Dive in and see if you can become the king of the ocean in Shark.io! 🏆

Play more games on the top-left menu.
